trait.name: Two Heads
entries: The ettin has advantage on Saviesa (Percepció) checks and on saving throws against being {@condition encegat}, {@condition fascinat}, {@condition eixordat}, {@condition acovardit}, {@condition atordit}, and knocked {@condition inconscient}.

trait.name: Wakeful
entries: When one of the ettin's heads is asleep, its other head is awake.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The ettin fa dos atacs: one with its battleaxe and one with its estel de l'alba.

action.name: Destral de guerra
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Estel de l'Alba
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Alè de Fire {@recharge 5}
entries: The ettin's right head exhales fire en un con de 30 peus. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 14}. Qui falli rep 45 ({@damage 10d8}) de dany de foc; qui superi, en rep la meitat.

action.name: Alè de Cold {@recharge 5}
entries: The ettin's left head exhales an icy blast en un con de 30 peus. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 14}. Qui falli rep 45 ({@damage 10d8}) de dany de fred; qui superi, en rep la meitat.

action.name: Gaze
entries: The ettin turns its magical gaze toward one creature that it can see within 120 feet of it. That target ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 14}. Unless the target is {@condition incapacitat}, it can avert its eyes to avoid the gaze and to automatically succeed on the save. If the target does so, it can't see the ettin until the start of the ettin's next turn. If the target looks at the ettin in the meantime, it must immediately make the save.
If the target fails the save, it suffers one of the following effects of the ettin's choice or at random:

action.name: Beguiling Gaze
entries: The target is {@condition atordit} until the start of the ettin's next turn or until the ettin is no longer within line of sight.

action.name: Esguard Hipnòtic
entries: The target is {@condition fascinat} by the ettin until the start of the ettin's next turn. The ettin chooses how the {@condition fascinat} target uses its actions, reactions, and movement.

action.name: Insanity Gaze
entries: The target suffers the effect of the confusion spell without making a saving throw. The effect lasts until the start of the ettin's next turn. The ettin doesn't need to concentrate on the spell.

items.name: Keen Hearing and Sight
entries: Andras advantage a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) que involucrin l'oïda o la vista.

items.name: Espasa curta
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de dany perforant, i l'objectiu ha de superar una salvada de Constitució amb {@dc 11} o be cursed with wererat lycanthropy.

items.name: Ballesta Lleugera
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 80/320 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) de dany perforant, i l'objectiu ha de superar una salvada de Constitució amb {@dc 11} o be cursed with wererat lycanthropy.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: Barbatos és llançador/a de conjurs de nivell 6. La seva habilitat de llançament de conjurs és Saviesa (CD per salvar conjur {@dc 13}, {@hit 5} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Té els següents conjurs d'explorador preparats:

trait.name: Rust Monster Cloak
entries: Any nonmagical weapon made of metal that hits Barbatos corrodes. After dealing damage, the weapon takes a permanent and cumulative -1 penalty to damage rolls. If its penalty drops to -5, the weapon is destroyed. Nonmagical ammunition made of metal that hits Barbatos is destroyed after dealing damage.

trait.name: Heart of the Troll
entries: Barbatos recupera 10 punts de toc a l'inici del seu torn. If Barbatos takes acid or fire damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of Barbatos's next turn. Barbatos dies only if he starts his turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Barbatos makes two bone shortsword attacks.

action.name: Bone Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Ballesta Lleugera
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 80/320 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) de dany perforant, i l'objectiu ha de superar una salvada de Constitució amb {@dc 13} o esdevenir {@condition emmetzinat} durant 1 hora. Si falla la salvada per 5 o més, the target is also {@condition inconscient}. The target regains consciousness if it takes damage or if another creature takes an action to shake it.

action.name: Cloak Sweep
entries: Barbatos corrodes a nonmagical ferrous metal object he can see within 5 feet of himself. If the object isn't being worn or carried, the touch destroys a 1-foot cube of it. If the object is being worn or carried by a creature, the creature can make a {@dc 12} Destresa saving throw to avoid Barbatos's touch.

If the object touched is either metal armor or a metal shield being worn or carried, it takes a permanent and cumulative 1 penalty to the AC it offers. Armor reduced to an AC of 10 or a shield that drops to a +0 bonus is destroyed. If the object touched is a held metal weapon, it rusts as described in Barbatos's Rust Monster Cloak trait.

action.name: Pick or Hammer
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) bludgeoning or piercing damage.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innat de The medusa's és Saviesa ({@dc 13} per salvar conjur). The medusa pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

trait.name: Mirada Petrificant
entries: Si una criatura que pugui veure la medusa comença el torn a 30 peus seus, la medusa pot forçar-la a salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 14}. Per poder fer-ho, la medusa no pot estar {@condition incapacitat} i ha de poder veure la criatura. Si la criatura falla per més de 5, es {@condition petrificat} immediatament. Otherwise, a creature that fails the save begins to turn to metal, wood, or porcelain (the medusa's choice) i està {@condition restrained}. La criatura {@condition restrained} ha de repetir la salvada a l'inici del seu proper torn. Si falla, estarà {@condition petrificat}. Si supera, l'efecte es cancel·la. La petrificació continuarà fins que un efecte màgic com ara {@spell restabliment superior} la cancel·li.

Una criatura no sorpresa pot desviar la mirada per evitar la salvada al principi del seu torn. Si ho fa, no veurà la medusa fins el principi del seu proper torn (on pot tornar a desviar la mirada). Si en algun moment la criatura mira a la medusa, ha de salvar immediatament.
Si la medusa es veu el reflexe a una superfície polida a 30 metres d'abast en una àrea de llum forta es veurà afectada per la seva pròpia maledicció.

items.name: Pacifying Spores (3/Dia)
entries: Grandfather Oak ejects spores at one creature it can see within 5 feet of it. L'objectiu ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 17} or be {@condition atordit} durant 1 minut. L'objectiu pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera.

trait.name: Equipament Especial
entries: Lynx's crystal eye is a magically shrunken crystal ball of visió veritable. One of her teeth is a refashioned anell de protecció mental, while another has been magicked to place her under a permanent Aura Màgica d'en Nystul spell, concealing the magic of these items and hiding her true nature from magic or features that can detect undead.

trait.name: Aversió al Foc
entries: If Lynx takes fire damage, she has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks until the end of her next turn.

trait.name: Forma Immutable
entries: Lynx is immune to any spell or effect that would alter her form.

trait.name: Absorbir Electricitat
entries: Whenever Lynx is subjected to lightning damage, she takes no damage and instead regains a number of hit points equal to the lightning damage dealt.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: Lynx té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

trait.name: Regeneració
entries: Lynx recupera 10 punts de toc a l'inici del seu torn. If she takes fire or radiant damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of her next turn. Lynx's body is destroyed only if she starts her turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

trait.name: Immunitat a l'Expulsió
entries: Lynx és immune als efectes que expulsin no-morts.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Lynx makes two shortsword attacks.

action.name: Espasa curta
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) de dany perforant.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: Moghadam is an 18th-level spellcaster. His habilitat de llançament de conjurs is Intel·ligència ({@dc 16} salvada de conjur, {@hit 8} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Té els següents conjurs de artificer preparats:

trait.name: Equipament Especial
entries: Moghadam wields {@item Ruinblade|IMR} (see appendix C).

trait.name: Artificial Mind
entries: Moghadam can manifest an artificial mind as a floating spectral image of a {@creature demilich}'s jeweled skull. Moghadam can communicate telepathically with this mind, send it fins a 300 peus away from him, and see and hear through it.

trait.name: Infoportation (1/Dia)
entries: Moghadam can teleport himself into an unoccupied space next to his artificial mind.

action.name: Ruinblade
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d6 + 2}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Blight (1/Dia)
entries: While wielding {@item Ruinblade|IMR}, Moghadam can cast el conjur {@spell plaga} ({@dc 15}).

action.name: Disintegrate (1/7 Days)
entries: While wielding {@item Ruinblade|IMR}, Moghadam can cast el conjur {@spell desintegrar} against any nonmagical object or creation of magical force.

action.name: Information Overload {@recharge 5}
entries: Moghadam overloads the thoughts of one creature within 5 feet of either himself or his artificial mind. L'objectiu ha de salvar per Intel·ligència amb {@dc 16} or take 22 ({@damage 4d8 + 4}) de dany psíquic, and the next attack roll made against the target before the end of Moghadam's next turn has advantage.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat (Psiònics)
headerEntries: The neo-otyugh's habilitat de llançament de conjurs innata is Intel·ligència ({@dc 12} salvació de conjur). Pot llançar els següents conjurs innatament sense requerir components

trait.name: Telepatia Limitada
entries: The otyugh can magically transmit simple messages and images to any creature within 120 feet of it that can understand a language. This form of telepathy doesn't allow the receiving creature to telepathically respond.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The neo-otyugh fa tres atacs: una Mossegada and two with its tentacles.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}16 ({@damage 2d10 + 5}) de dany perforant. If the target is a creature, ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 17} against disease o esdevenir {@condition emmetzinat} until the disease is cured. Every 24 hours that elapse, the target must repeat the saving throw, reducing its punts de vida màxims by 5 ({@dice 1d10}) on a failure. The disease is cured on a success. The target dies if the disease reduces its punts de vida màxims to 0. Aquesta reducció de punts de vida màxims dura fins que the disease is cured.

action.name: Tentacle
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 15 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d10 + 5}) de dany contundent. Si l'objectiu és Gran o menor, està {@condition grappled} ({@dc 16} per escapar) and {@condition restrained} until the grapple ends. The neo-otyugh has two tentacles, each of which can grapple un objectiu.

action.name: Batre Tencacle
entries: The neo-otyugh slams creatures {@condition grappled} by it into each other or a solid surface. Each creature ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 16} or take 15 ({@damage 3d6 + 5}) de dany contundent and be {@condition atordit} fins el final del proper torn de the neo-otyugh. Si supera, l'objectiu rep half the dany contundent i no està {@condition atordit}.

items.name: Pas Terràqui
entries: Seodra can move across terreny difícil made of earth or stone without expending extra movement.

items.name: Treasure Sense
entries: Seodra can pinpoint, by scent, the location of precious metals and stones, such as coins and gems, within 60 feet of her.

trait.name: Equipament Especial
entries: Mestre Ursas wears a anell de protecció mental and armadura de plaques of fire resistance.

trait.name: Coratge
entries: Mestre Ursas has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition acovardit}.

trait.name: Fera
entries: Quan Mestre Ursas impacta amb un atac cos a cos, fa 1 dau de dany extra (included in his attack).

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Mestre Ursas fa 3 atacs cos a cos or two ranged attacks.

action.name: Urpa
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast i 20/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) de dany perforant, o 13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) de dany perforant si s'usa a dues mans per un atac cos a cos.

action.name: Shield Bash
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d4 + 4}) de dany contundent, and si l'objectiu és una criatura Mitjana o menor, ha de salvar per Força amb {@dc 15} or be knocked {@condition enderrocat}.

reaction.name: Parada
entries: Mestre Ursas adds 3 to his AC against one melee attack that would hit him. To do so, he must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

_copy.name: Warlock of the Primer de Tots

action.name: Urpes d'Au
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}8 ({@damage 2d6 + 1}) de dany tallant.

items.name: Fist of Retribution
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d4 + 8}) de dany contundent mes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) de dany de foc.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: Thessalar is an 18th-level spellcaster. His habilitat de llançament de conjurs is Intel·ligència ({@dc 16} salvada de conjur, {@hit 8} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Té els següents conjurs de artificer preparats:

trait.name: Equipament Especial
entries: Thessalar wields a {@item +1 daga} coated with {@item Thessaltoxin|IMR|thessaltoxin poison} (see appendix C).

trait.name: Homúncul Alquímic
entries: Thessalar is accompanied by his {@creature Thessalar's homunculus|IMR}. If el conjur {@spell apedaçar} is cast on it, the homunculus regains {@dice 2d6} hit points.

trait.name: Healing Toxicity
entries: Any magic item that restores hit points and can be applied to a piercing or slashing weapon (a potion, an ointment, and so forth) causes a hit with that weapon to deal extra damage to Thessalar equal to the amount the item would normally heal.

trait.name: Restabliment Superior (1/Dia)
entries: Thessalar can cast {@spell restabliment superior} if he has access to {@item Materials d'alquímia|phb|alchemical supplies}.

action.name: Daga
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 20/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) de dany perforant, i l'objectiu ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 15}. Si falla, the target is affected as if by the {@spell polimorfia} spell, transforming into a random {@filter beast|bestiary|type=beast|miscellaneous=!swarm} or a creature it has seen within the last 24 hours (as chosen by the DM). This effect lasts until the target finishes a long rest.

items.name: Bava Acídica
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} a impactar, range 30ft., un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) de dany d'àcid.

monster.name: Contructe Cor Thessal
idiomes: comprèn els idiomes dels seus creadors però no pot parlar

trait.name: Telepathic Bond
entries: While the construct is on the same plane of existence as its master, it can magically convey what it senses to its master, and the two can communicate telepathically.

action.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}1 de dany tallant, i l'objectiu ha de superar una salvada de Constitució amb {@dc 10} o estar {@condition emmetzinat} durant 1 minut. Si falla la salvada per 5 o més, the target is instead {@condition emmetzinat} for 5 ({@dice 1d10}) minutes and {@condition inconscient} while {@condition emmetzinat} in this way.

monster.name: Kraken Thessal
idiomes: and Primordial però no pot parlar

trait.name: Amfibi
entries: The kraken thessal pot respirar aire i a l'aigua

trait.name: Llibertat de Moviments
entries: The kraken thessal ignores terreny difícil, and magical effects can't reduce its speed or cause it to be {@condition restrained}. It can spend 5 feet of movement to escape from nonmagical restraints or being {@condition grappled}.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The kraken thessal makes one bite attack and two tentacle attacks. It can replace each tentacle attack with one use of Fling.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}20 ({@damage 3d8 + 7}) de dany perforant mes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) de dany d'àcid. Si l'objectiu és una criatura Mitjana o menor {@condition grappled} by the kraken thessal, that creature is swallowed, and the grapple ends. Una criatura empassada està {@condition encegat} i {@condition restrained}, té cobertura total contra atacs fora de the kraken thessal, i rep 21 ({@damage 6d6}) de dany d'àcid a l'inici de cada torn de the kraken thessal's.

If the kraken thessal rep 35 o més de dany en un sol torn from a creature inside it, ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 23} at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, which fall {@condition enderrocat} in a space within 10 feet of the kraken thessal. Si the kraken thessal mor, una criatura empassada ja no està {@condition restrained} i pot escapar del cadàver fent servir 10 peus de moviment. Surt {@condition enderrocat}.

action.name: Tentacle
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} a impactar, 20 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}17 ({@damage 3d6 + 7}) de dany tallant, i l'objectiu està {@condition grappled} ({@dc 16} per escapar). Fins que s'acabi aquesta presa, l'objectiu està {@condition restrained}. The kraken thessal té deu tentacles, i cadascun pot apresar un objectiu.

action.name: Estimbar
entries: One Medium or smaller object held or creature {@condition grappled} by the kraken thessal is thrown fins a 40 peus in a random direction and knocked {@condition enderrocat}. If a thrown target strikes a solid surface, l'objectiu rep 3 ({@damage 1d6}) de dany contundent for every 10 feet it was thrown. If the target is thrown at another creature, that creature ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 16} or take the same damage and be knocked {@condition enderrocat}.

action.name: Saliva Àcida {@recharge 5}
entries: The kraken thessal spits a glob of acid at a point it can see within 60 feet of it. Tota criatura a 10 peus de that point ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 18}. Qui falli rep 22 ({@damage 4d10}) de dany d'àcid; qui superi, en rep la meitat.

legendary.name: Tentacle Attack
entries: The kraken thessal makes one tentacle attack.

legendary.name: Estimbar
entries: The kraken thessal uses Fling.

legendary.name: Núvol de tinta (Costa 3 Accions)
entries: While underwater, the kraken thessal expels an ink cloud in a 60-foot radius. The cloud s'extén per les cantonades, and that area is heavily obscured to creatures other than the kraken thessal. Each creature other than the kraken thessal that ends its turn there ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 18}. Qui falli rep 16 ({@damage 3d10}) de dany de verí; qui superi, en rep la meitat. A strong current disperses the cloud, which otherwise disappears at the end of the kraken thessal's next turn.

trait.name: Aguantar la Respiració
entries: The two-headed crocodile pot aguantar la respiració durant 15 minuts.

trait.name: Two Heads
entries: The two-headed crocodile has advantage on Saviesa (Percepció) checks and on saving throws against being {@condition encegat}, {@condition fascinat}, {@condition eixordat}, {@condition acovardit}, {@condition atordit}, and knocked {@condition inconscient}.

trait.name: Wakeful
entries: When one of the crocodile's heads is asleep, its other head is awake.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The two-headed crocodile fa dos atacs with its bite.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d10 + 2}) de dany perforant, i l'objectiu està {@condition grappled} ({@dc 12} per escapar). Fins que s'acabi aquesta presa, l'objectiu està {@condition restrained}, and that head of the crocodile no pot mossegar a un altre objectiu.

trait.name: Two Heads
entries: The mussolós de dos caps has advantage on Saviesa (Percepció) checks and on saving throws against being {@condition encegat}, {@condition fascinat}, {@condition eixordat}, {@condition acovardit}, {@condition atordit}, and knocked {@condition inconscient}.

trait.name: Wakeful
entries: When one of the owlbear's heads is asleep, its other head is awake.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The mussolós de dos caps fa tres atacs: two with its beaks and un amb les Urpes.

action.name: Bec
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d10 + 5}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) de dany tallant.
